Key Match Events: Will Benson hit a three-run homer
The Reds came back from a 5-run deficit to take the lead
Benson's second homer of the game sealed the win
The Reds scored 6 runs in the 7th inning
The A's responded with 4 runs in the 8th inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Reds are running out of starting pitchers in both the big leagues and in Triple-A
Fernando Cruz will start as a reliever for the Reds
Osvaldo Bido has dominated against left-handed hitters this season
Post-Match Reflections: The Reds showed some life after coming back from a 5-run deficit
Pagan's poor outing cost the Reds
The Reds have 6 more games at home and then 2 more on the road
Miscellaneous Highlights: The crowd was small at Great American Ball Park
The A's have been more invested in these games than the Reds
The Reds have been struggling with fundamentals and base running
